author: mmanders
msg: Fixed logic when attempting to reuse connections in ajp_send_request.  If the send is successful, we needed to get out of the while loop.  If the ping/pong or the request failed, try and reuse without getting out of the loop.

author: larryi
msg: Port convertURI() method so URIEncoding setting has the desired effect.

author: mmanders
msg: Updated to build properly for NetWare with recent socket additions.

author: mmanders
msg: Added check for AF_INET (IPV4) type address from APR (when used).

author: billbarker
msg: Fix session-expiring test to be like 5.0.
Even though these classes live in j-t-c, AFAIK, they are only used by Tomcat 3.3.x.
